content: It's great that you have a strong sense of love and purpose in your life, and that you're committed to working on a plan to move forward. Remember that it's okay to feel sad and to take the time to process your emotions, especially when dealing with difficult situations like the loss of a loved one or relationship conflicts. Make sure to prioritize self-care and take steps to support your mental health as you work on your plan. And don't hesitate to reach out for support from loved ones, a therapist, or other resources if needed.
